pages.text: It is important to note that, while most $(cat:herbs)herbs$() have specific methods or recipes to obtain, all of them can be sustained renewably, without repeated crafting or gathering.$(br2)As mentioned in the $(l:herbs/introduction)introduction$(), most herbs can be planted as crops under the right circumstances, while others can be generated using rituals.

pages.title: Crops
pages.text: All herbs but $(l:herbs/terra_moss)terra moss$() can be grown as crops, although the elemental plants require special soil.$(br2)$(l:herbs/baffle_cap)Baffle cap$() will spread in the same way as vanilla mushrooms, and sprout a giant mushroom if bone meal is used.$(br2)Of the remaining plants, $(l:herbs/wildroot)wildroot$() can be planted directly wherever normal crops would grow, including onto any one of the $(l:resources/elemental_soil)elemental soils$().

pages.title: Seeds & Elementals
pages.text: The remaining herbs, $(l:herbs/moonglow)moonglow$(), $(l:herbs/pereskia)pereskia$(), $(l:herbs/spirit_herb)spirit herb$() and $(l:herbs/wildewheet)wildewheet$() can be converted to seeds and planted wherever crops grow.$(br2)Elemental herbs, $(l:herbs/cloud_berry)cloud berry$(), $(l:herbs/dewgonia)dewgonia$(), $(l:herbs)infernal bulb$() & $(l:herbs/stalicripe)stalicripe$() require $(l:resources/elemental_soil)elemental soil$() and are planted directly, as with wildroot.$(br2)$(info) Element matching with soils is not required.

pages.title: Instructions
pages.text: Each herb page will contain a section near the end detailing under what conditions it can be grown, and if any further steps (such as converting from herb to seed) are required.$(br2)Most entries will also describe the herb visually, along with how it appears when matured & ready to harvest.

pages.title: Completion
pages.text: To complete this entry, plant all of the renewable resources described above and in their individual entries on the relevant soils.$(br2)There are 9 in total, and you can track them with the $(adv:roots:renewable_renaissance)$() advancement.
